title: ESG Is Topic Du Jour At Structured Finance Shindig - Securitization & Structured Finance - United States - Mondaq
content: ESG Is Topic Du Jour At Structured Finance Shindig - Securitization & Structured Finance - United States  Mondaq
description: This week, the Structured Finance Association held its 3rd Annual "Environmental, Social and Governance in Structured Finance Symposium," hosted at Cadwalader's office in New York City on May 3 and 4.
